explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of interpretable machine learning models to forecast systemic financial risk.
explanations.interpretable machine learning: The paper discusses the use of interpretable machine learning models and compares intrinsic interpretable models with post-hoc explainable methods.
explanations.feature learning: The paper analyzes feature variables and their predictive power, indicating a focus on feature learning.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses the use of feature variables and their relationship with systemic financial risk, suggesting an interest in feature representation.
